This is trivial to prove automatically, but let's do it manually:
\begin{tcAthena}
conclude conjecture
  pick-any b:Bool
    assume hyp := (f b = b)
      (!chain [(f f b)
             = (f b)    [hyp]
             = b        [hyp]])
\end{tcAthena}
